detailsOfAchievement: Organization is working in more than 100 villages of vidisha, Rasine, Rajgarh and Hoshangabad districts of Madhya Pradesh State since 2000. since than organization has been working for socio-economic development of poor rural community and achieving the progress regularly. More ever organization has been working in holistic development manner in our service area with collaborating various agencies of government and other agencies for the development of backward community. So that, period of time organization has made link up with more than 2600 families. The Aims of organization is to strives for the development of poor community through following social and economic development programme. 1. Agriculture Advancement Programme 2. Animal Husbandry Development Programme 3. Entrepreneurship Development Prog 4. Women Empowerment & Chind Develop. 5. Health & Hygiene Programme. 6. Education Development Programme. 7. Adolescent education programme. 8. Vocational education programme. 9. Social welfare Programme. 10. Enviornment Protection Programme. 11. Scince and Technology Dissemination Programme. 12. Soil and Water Conservation Programme. ACHIEVMENTS:- 1. Agriculture Crop Productivity has been Enhanced through implementing ATMA, NFSM, MPCOST Projects in our service area with 600 crop demonstration under the transferring of technology. 2. Integrated post management system has been promoted in our service area to minimize the risk of human health environment and economic. 3. dairy & goutry units has been set up with 160 BPL families under the economic up-gradation. 4.Seventy SHG have been formed in our services area village and women linked up with micro- finance under the women empowerment. 5.30 short term training programme for unemployed youth under entrepreneurship development programme. 6.16 human health camp organized under out reach health programme. 7.7 campaigns organization on water conservation and plantation. 8.An awareness campaign done on drinking water under national ruler drinking water safety program in vidisha district of MP through public health department. 9.NPL survey done of vidisha district of Madhya Pradesh through MP Jan Abhiyan Parisad 10.Beside these economic assistance to poor student farmers schedule cast & tribe have been done by organization under social welfare programme

detailsOfAchievement: SESTM has been for the past 12 years working with the weaker sections of the society in the district of Jabalpur , Mandla , Katni and Sager and Nersinghpur of Madhya Pradesh. It had run two major projects in the Jabalpur district. The organization with its support from World Vision ADP, Jabalpur and WCD department and other Agencies i. A health and nutrition programme was organized in Gram panchayat Dongarjhansi, Jabalpur for malnourished children. In this programme mothers were trained to cook nutritive food. It was a 7 days programme in which the children were given this nutritive food made by their mothers. The weight of the children was recorded in this time period. The data showed that there was a marked increment in the weight of the children. This programme was repeated after every alternate month upto 6 months.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: To document indigenous knowledge prevalent among tribal communities of five districts of Madhya Pradesh. Madhya Pradesh for assessing the status of consevation and sustainable use practices for non timber forest products. it is intended to learn the prevalent practices and to improve upon them through modern technologies and thinking. current knowledge and practices for conservation. The programme envisaged community mobilization and training.
The Non Timber Forest Products resources are declining alarmingly in most part of India. It has drastically reduced the household income of gatherers and is resulting in loss of biodiversity.
Project progressed with identified 50 Women SHGs. Some Ten Thousands were adopted and nurtured in-situ.

The project is progressing well with about 25 thousands plants of usable NTFP species adopted and nurtured in the two project districts. The SHGs have been empowered to negotiate with traders about remunerative prices. Household income is gradually increasing. There is need to upscale this work so that more area could be covered. M P Forest department been approached to take up work in other areas also.

detailsOfAchievement: We are running more than 50 center across Madhya Pradesh for skill development training. we have completed many training related to govt. and central govt. project. we are working in the filed of employment of woman, we also provide free skill development training to deaf and dumb student . we have successfully completed BPL card and labor diary Student job oriented training program, we also organize free medical test people of rural area and needed people.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: OUR NGO has Receive funds from NGO Member and public donation only, We have organized all social and educational program from self fund. we are doing all such kind of activities with self fund. we have developed well established infrastructure for all kind of govt. and non govt. program , we are prepare for any skill program for further .... we having team and trained staff for all skill trade.. we having all documents related for any kind of requirements of project...

In the period of 2015-2016 we have done many kind of social and educational program from public donation and society members... we having supporting staff also for each and any skill program.. in the end of the year we have developed many skill development center in entire city of Madhya Pradesh.. and we also providing fees less IT education a our personal center for upgrading the knowledge of computer of student..

At present we are fully prepare for each and any kind of skill training from govt. we expect from govt. for our next program because our mission is on large area of Madhya Pradesh, we want to establish more than 100 center across Madhya Pradesh till 2020. we hope for better support from govt.

As we have mention our vision and mission that we want to establish more than 100 center across Madhya Pradesh.. we are moving forward for better future of India skill program in IT Sector and fees less education for needy people.. we also prepare for saving environment program and Swachchha Bharat Abhiyan....
